1.definition: The average mass of a molecule relative to one twelfth of the mass of an atom of carbon-12
1.question: Define relative molecular mass
1.name: RMM
1.multipleChoiceResponses: {A: 'The mass of an atom relative to one twelfth of the mass of an atom of carbon', B: 'The mass of a compound relative to one twelfth of the mass of an atom of carbon-12', C: 'The average mass of a molecule relative to one twelfth of the mass of an atom of carbon-12', D: 'The average mass of an element relative to one twelfth of the mass of an atom of carbon-12.'}
1.checklist: ['average OR mean mass of a molecule', 'relative to one twelfth of the mass', 'of an atom of carbon-12']
